Text: how many times can they remaster this? Stick to the original Jap Vinyl.

Sorry folks.  I just noticed there is a slight glitch at the end of track 8 on CD 2.  It's kind of strange because the log didn't indicate any problems.  Anyway, I've uploaded a fix for that track rather than upload the entire CD again.  Many apologies.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5577227
Thank you so much for the download and fix. I wish more people would seed this. The other "new" Exile is passworded to some web survey (sucks) so folks GET THIS ONE.
COME ON AND SEED - 1 SEEDER and everyone stuck at 80%

This remaster has to be good.....Jagger did it himself earlier this year. :)

Also there are 10 new tracks on this ediition, 5 of which were never released songs. The other half are alternate takes.

Thanks for sharing this.
